Identification_Area.title: Browse Plot of the Earth-based observer's view of the sky plane during the Uranus System Occultation of star u17b (Hipparcos 80841) Observed from the SAAO 188cm Telescope

Citation_Information.author_list: French, R. G.; McGhee-French, C. A.; Gordon, M. K.
Citation_Information.description: Plot of the altitude (in degrees) of Uranus and the sun relative to the horizon over the duration of the stellar occultation of star u17b (Hipparcos 80841) Observed by the SAAO 188cm Telescope

File.comment: This figure shows the altitude (in degrees) of Uranus and the sun relative to the horizon over the duration of the stellar occultation of star u17b (Hipparcos 80841) Observed by the SAAO 188cm Telescope, plotted as a function of time in UTC at the telescope. The thin black line plots the altitude of Uranus, and the thin red line (if on scale) shows the altitude of the Sun. If there is a planetary occultation, the lines are thickened to show the interval when the star is hidden behind the planet. The approximate predicted ring occultation times are shown as filled circles, with selected ring features individually labeled.

Field_Delimited.name: Star Number
Field_Delimited.description: Reference ID number used to identify star position used in ring orbit fit.

Field_Delimited.name: Star Name
Field_Delimited.description: Internal shorthand name for occultation star.

Field_Delimited.name: Source Catalog
Field_Delimited.description: Name of source catalog for star position (e.g., Hipparcos, 2MASS, UCAC4).

Field_Delimited.name: Catalog ID
Field_Delimited.description: The identification number of the star within the Source Catalog.

Field_Delimited.name: RA(ICRS)
Field_Delimited.description: Mean right ascencion International Celestial Reference System (ICRS) J2000.0 epoch.

Field_Delimited.name: DE(ICRS)
Field_Delimited.description: Mean declination International Celestial Reference System (ICRS) J2000.0 epoch.

Field_Delimited.name: Plx
Field_Delimited.description: Trigonometric parallax in millisecond of arc milli-second of arc.

Field_Delimited.name: pmRA
Field_Delimited.description: Proper motion in RA in equatorial coordinates in millisecond of arc milli-second of arc per year.

Field_Delimited.name: pmDE
Field_Delimited.description: Proper motion in DE in equatorial coordinates in milli-second of arc per year.

Field_Delimited.name: e_RAdeg
Field_Delimited.description: Standard error in RA*cos(delta) in millisecond of arc.

Field_Delimited.name: e_DEdeg
Field_Delimited.description: Standard error in DE in millisecond of arc.

Field_Delimited.name: e_Plx
Field_Delimited.description: Standard error in Plx in millisecond of arc.

Field_Delimited.name: e_pmRA
Field_Delimited.description: Standard error in pmRA in millisecond of arc.

Field_Delimited.name: e_pmDE
Field_Delimited.description: Standard error in pmDE in millisecond of arc.
